name: Tiny Gem Raiders
description:
Play as 3 tiny Gem Raiders navigating crumbling catacombs full of hidden treasure. This game was made for TriJam#171 with the theme "Watch Your Step".

How to Play

  • All your gem raiders must reach the top exit area to continue.
  • A raider will not exit the level without holding a gem.
  • Tiles are unstable and will fall away as you step on them.
  • Use arrow keys to navigate.
  • Use [R] to reset.
  • Use [U] to undo.

Notes for the jam:

  1. Game was finished in 2h59m with no sound in three 1hr sessions.
  2. Game was finished in 3h10m with sound.
